channel.title: Excision | Lumbridge PvP | Jinrake remake type | Nothing Special
channel.description:
Hello i just thought i'd release one of my servers to the community. It is elevationrsps based. Have Fun :) No Anti Leach
[COLOR="#008000"]
[ul]A really neat combat system.[/ul]
[ul]Player Attack & Follow clipping.[/ul]
[ul]A lot of exploits were patched.[/ul]
[ul]Most Dupes were patched.[/ul]
[ul]Stable Core.[/ul]
[ul]100% Working Clan Chats.[/ul]
[ul]PvP Areas + Safe Zones.[/ul]
[ul]100% Switching.[/ul]
[ul]quest tab pk information.[/ul]
[ul]Correct food & Pot delay.[/ul]
[ul]Working on some other features atm :).[/ul]
[/Color]
[spoiler="Server Media"] [center] Log in screen [IMG]http://img46.imageshack.us/img46/5660/lgt5e35.png[/img]
Home [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YSdS5eV.png[/img]
Safe Zone [IMG]http://img809.imageshack.us/img809/2797/lgta33e.png[/img]
PvP [IMG]http://img35.imageshack.us/img35/1447/lgt5c2e.png[/img]
KQ Entra [IMG]http://img607.imageshack.us/img607/5622/lgt8d33.png[/img]
Thieving [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/nvvkYZ4.png[/img]
Random Messages [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/bjxEppe.png[/img]
Training Npc [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/1TXyDCh.png[/img]
Training Area [img]http://i.imgur.com/3z8cqp8.png[/img]
Teleports(x3) [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fK0HPZg.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GKQBq6p.png[/img]
Shopping [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/pWqUUoZ.png[/img]
Barrows [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/iZb7oRV.png[/img]
Extra Tele's (safe) [IMG]http://img600.imageshack.us/img600/3811/lgt55aa.png[/img]
Boss Areas!(wildy and safe) [IMG]http://img19.imageshack.us/img19/2036/lgt69e6.png[/img]
Added Slayer [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/s56hIyg.png[/img]
Added Npc Count + Shop(You get by killing any npc) [IMG]http://img507.imageshack.us/img507/1779/lgtf3fe.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/p0yKL2B.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/tPI1ea3.png[/img]
Skilling added [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/YP8vNSA.png[/img]
[/center] [/spoiler]
[spoiler=packaged link]
Enjoy
[url=https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/4vca98euep6orqf/Excision%20Package%20Release.zip]https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/s/4vca98euep6orqf/Excision%20Package%20Release.zip[/url] [/spoiler]
Be sure to give credits if you do decide to use.
